website_summaries.verdict: The smallest keyboard we tested with the longest-lasting battery. A great value for this price.
pros: This ultra-portable model weighs only 5 oz
and the battery can last 2 months on standby following a 2-hour charge
Includes a case that doubles as a stand for phones and tablets, elevating them like a screen for easier typing
cons: The slightly different key layout and gap down the center may create a learning curve for touch-typists

customer_reviews.title: This arrived and I connected it easily to my iPad - worked beautifully
customer_reviews.text: It is very hard to write this review as there are such mixed issues. This arrived and I connected it easily to my iPad - worked beautifully. A little while later, i paired it with my iPhone and it worked perfectly. However, since then, I CAN NOT get it to pair again with my iPad mini and that is the main reason I bought it. Additionally, we are leaving for 10 days and I wanted it for my trip. I can not find any way to have a “conversation” regarding this. Extremely frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Neil C Smith

customer_reviews.title: Lovely hardware, a few nits to pick
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Lovely hardware, looks good with my iPad. Works well on the first day, easy to set up (since I've used many Bluetooth keyboards). I like it and feel it's a good deal. Cons: manual is unbelievably unhelpful, as another reviewer mentioned. Almost a caricature of lousy translated pamphlets. The shipping and inner box were in the worst shape I've ever received in years of ordering online. I was concerned that the keyboard might have been damaged, but it was unblemished and seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Can't tell how to use the thing
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE. The manufacturer was in touch with me by email immediately, crafted a new more idiomatic manual (with pictures!), and has supplied some of the best customer care I have received. No problem with iPhone and iPad. It may be in time that we'll resolve the Windows 10 issue and the issue may be with my laptop and not their keyboard. I'm on internet vacation at the moment and won't be able to do the work to see where the problem is. GREAT customer support.
customer_reviews.author: SJW

customer_reviews.title: Just might buy a second for my ps4, and third for my laptop.
customer_reviews.text: As of now, I love it. It works perfectly. I didn't even have to read the directions. Just charge it up, turn it on, hit 'connect' and scan for bluetooth on your phone. Click the keyboard and type in the connect number on the keyboard, then hit enter and it works great. It's just barely bigger than my phone but about the size of a laptop keyboard. A magnet holds it shut when it isn't in use. The only problem you may encounter is not having a flat surface.
customer_reviews.author: Anon Y Mous

customer_reviews.title: Transitioned iPad into a more user-friendly device for schoolwork
customer_reviews.text: Extremely compatible keyboard that's easily stored in my daughter's backpack and used during school. It's transitioned her school-provided iPad into a more user friendly device to complete her assignments and reports. She hasn't had any issues with the keyboard and really loves how transportable it is. I get the sense that she feels like the 'cool tech kid' when she uses it in the classroom.
customer_reviews.author: MN MOM

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Works better for me than the onscreen keyboard for my samsung tablet. I can't fast type like on a standard keyboard, because the spacing of the keys is different due to the size. But with the onscreen keyboard, I can only do 1 tap at a time. It feels sturdy and the keys have a good feel to them. Much easier to carry around and shove into a bag than my standard size bluetooth keyboard. And the case works well for a tablet stand. Better than the ones I've tried with a narrow slot.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love This!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who is EXTREMELY clumsy and he LOVES it! I like the fact that it's compact, folds up AND has a really sturdy case to keep it safe. Some of the other keyboards that I looked at looked extremely flimsy and weren't as portable. This one fits in his pocket which is great as well since he tends to lose EVERYTHING! I like this one so much that I'm purchasing one for my daughter who is actually a lot more responsible with her things. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who has clumsy, irresponsible children!
customer_reviews.author: Ladie_Marine

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the Logitech keyboard I bought at the Apple store was too narrow and it felt really cramped. Plus it was over $75. So when I opened this one up and unfolded it, it was better for sure. But...it feels super cheap to the touch - clicky and clunky and SUPER noisy. And the space between the v and b keys is very wide, so for touch typing it’s a real problem - it’s a huge reach across the hinge. So I guess given that it was 1/3 the price of the Logi keyboard I shouldn’t expect too much. But it’s embarrassing in business meetings to be making so much noise.
customer_reviews.author: Thankyouoakland

customer_reviews.title: This is a great keyboard. I love the design because it is ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great keyboard. I love the design because it is so compact. The holder holds my iPad and iPhone very well. It is great for work and if you are tired of using your thumb when texting...
customer_reviews.author: N. A.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible to use
customer_reviews.text: The 'B' Key is out of place , is too far away for your right hand fingers to use. Horrible layout of keys. Same thing with the "?" key as well. it not where you would expect it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Jagan

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Great Folding Bluetooth Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product for the price. It’s beautiful, has a long-lasting battery life, and is comfortable to type on. It’s the second of these I’ve purchased, the first from another retailer. It’s an impressive little piece of equipment, clad in aluminum, with a white plastic face and chiclet keys. Pairs easily, works with iOS, Android, and Windows mobile devices.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Camack

customer_reviews.title: Horrible typing experience
customer_reviews.text: The whole point of this keyboard was to have better typing experience than virtual keyboards, but in many respects I found it to be worse because of the different key layouts, different key sizes, and spaces betweeen keys. For example, typing ‘being’ was very awkward and I had to correct myself repeatedly because of having to reach over extended spaces for ‘ b’ due to middle folding space, and the awkward positions of ‘n’ ‘m’ etc. and the tiny backspace key. Just horrible design!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: Garbage! Takes about 5 minutes to find the device it's connecting to. Bad connection overall. Typing is delayed. If your a somewhat fast typer, it will deive you nuts. Doesn't type all the letters. It was half the cost of the purchase to return it, so I just tossed it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: latasha reed

customer_reviews.title: Broke and unable to return
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this keyboard and it was perfect for my portable office. My first one broke so I had to return it to get a second and then the second one recently broke in the same way (the blue tooth stopped connecting) and even though I bought a 1 year warranty, they are saying it is not applicable- so then what is the point of the warranty. I don't like leaving bad reviews and tried to contact the company through email and there is simply an auto-reply that the company is no longer operating? But then how are they selling keyboards!? I just want a working keyboard and this was really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy J

customer_reviews.title: Love this foldable keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Love this foldable keyboard. Works great, and holds the charge a LONG time. Connects easily, and after connecting the first time, automatically connects after that. Keys are easy to use, and "click" so you know when you hit them. Laid out nicely, and works great. I reviewed a lot of keyboards, and this one fit the bill. Not regretting the purchase at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Warranty but no way to redeem
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and from the beginning the I key never worked and I never could find a way to contact the manufacturer to get there supposed one year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: J MacPherson

customer_reviews.title: Could have been laid out better
customer_reviews.text: This is a feature rich keyboard, with a handy protective case that doubles as a stand to hold the phone at whatever distance is desired. It doesn't fit the hands very well and, therefore, is kind of clumsy to use. Placing the keys like they are on a standard keyboard would have been a nice touch. Still, it beats the heck out of trying to type on the "keyboard" the iphone provides. Overall, a worthwhile investment.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M. Balascio

customer_reviews.title: Light, easy to use and comes with a stand!
customer_reviews.text: This foldable keyboard is lightweight, has a great feel to the keys and comes with a stand for a phone or tablet. The stand even doubles as a case for the keyboard! Great overall design--the only drawback is the place where the fold is. I expected that with a foldable keyboard, but it still takes some getting used to, especially for a touch typist like me. Still, I really like how it looks and how easily it connects to my iPad. All that for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: David D. Carlsen

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I just got this so initial impressions only. If there are durability issues I'll update this. I received the keyboard and plugged it in - microUSB connection. Keyboard paired with iPhone & older Android phones no issues. All keys seem to function. I'm kind of fussy about keyboards and while this is no IBM model M, it's not bad at all. Beats the crap out of onscreen keyboards.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Best Mini Keyboard I Purchased !
customer_reviews.text: When I travel my mini keyboard is essential in my backpack. I tested about 5 mini keyboards and this is it ! Very small, it comes with it's own stand, one fold open it up and the best is that the case is it's own stand. You will not regret traveling with this gadget. It will make typing very simple and effortless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not practical for quick typing!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to use this keyboard for quick typing but unfortunately the way it was built, not good. Overall if you are looking for a simple Bluetooth keyboard, you might like it. I was hoping to get a foldable version of a real desktop keyboard . this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing...Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I just received this item yesterday and all I can say is WOW!!! I was a bit concerned that something so reasonably priced could be as good as some of the reviews were stating. The “feel”of the typing experience is very good and the connectivity with Bluetooth is excellent....I would highly recommend this item to anyone who want a keyboard that’s portable and very usable.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Or Mary Konkel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the person on the go
customer_reviews.text: Love this keyboard. Very lightweight and perfect for your pocket or backpack. Easy to pair and works great with my android phone and my Kindle. I also have arthritis in my hands so using this keyboard is perfect for this. The only thing is the special fn key instructions are a little difficult to figure out with each device and does take some trial and error to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Stahlman

customer_reviews.title: Keys will stop working in 1-6 months
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my third one of these in <18 months because keys stopped working on each one. This latest one lost key functionality before 30 days were even up! I use it daily and I'm not heavy handed (the keys that go out are usually by the pinky anyway which barely get any keystroke force) but regardless this is very weak construction if entire groups of keys stop working so soon. I'd hoped to get at least a year or two out of these but looks like I can't even get 1 month. I do not recommend this product, there are major quality issues.
customer_reviews.author: A.D.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Portable Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good for the money. Sturdy, solid, compact, and folds easily and slides well into case. Works well on iPhone and iPad. iPhone with case will not fit into slide-out holder. Case is thick and a bit bulky but will hold iPad Pro well. Keyboard itself is just a little small and takes some effort to adjust to vs. full size Bluetooth keyboard. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Mack

customer_reviews.title: Worked beautifully but for only a few months!
customer_reviews.text: At first was delighted: After spilling a cup of coffee on my Surface Book, several keys were unresponsive and would have required an expensive repair. Attached this keyboard with a little cardboard, for lift and support, and velcro, and now my laptops works (almost) as good as new! But after 2 1/2 months it stopped working. It wasn't the cord itself. It would not get power from any compatible cord. I purchased another one because I liked it so much. We'll see how long this one lasts. w
customer_reviews.author: SCarlson

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: As described. Simple to connect. Does not lock while open so you will need flat surface to type or it will fold in.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: If the function keys aren't working, try this
customer_reviews.text: My initial review: Several of the punctuation keys are incorrectly mapped/labeled. Keyboard is unusable It turned out the issue was with international keyboards. When I set the keyboard to Spanish the function keys were mis-mapped. This is a problem with *all* external keyboards and isn 't special to this product. Set your keyboard to 'English-US' and all the keys will work right
customer_reviews.author: Nočnica Fee

customer_reviews.title: A favorite purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly one of the best purchases I have ever made. It’s a lifesaver! My hands hurt whenever I try to type on my phone for too long. This totally saves my hands! So glad I bought it, but I wish I had bought it years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon U

customer_reviews.title: Handy and so far reliable keyboard
customer_reviews.text: So far I am eddy pleased with this keyboard. It connects quickly with my apple IPad Pro and phone. Battery seems to last a long time. Would recommend buyin g this.product. Folds away and fits in my purse so i can carry it with me. Would recommend placing it in a small cloth bag to keep debre from gegtting into keys and parts.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Watson

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, efficient, valuable tool.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I've had this about a month and only used it a few times but the battery is still going strong. The keyboard is ready to use and the Bluetooth connects seamlessly. I can also connect Bluetooth audio at the same time... So I can listen to something while I write. I'm pretty pleased.
customer_reviews.author: VLC

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and functional!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard was a life-saver when my laptop broke; I use it to write copy and stories on my phone, and it works like a charm. Great battery life, easy to connect via Bluetooth; my one complaint is that one of the arrow keys is too easy to hit accidentally when I’m trying to type a question mark, and honestly it’s more of an inconvenience than anything, and I can’t think of how to lay such a keyboard out while both keeping the size as is and fixing the issue. Anyway, excellent little peripheral.
customer_reviews.author: Rozen

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth it’s Price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so that I could write papers on the go, and it’s perfect! Its battery life is really impressive, and it even fits into my smallest purse. Admittedly, the keyboard size took a little bit of getting used to, but all do! And I definitely would never pack it without the plastic case it comes in (which also acts as a stand for your phone) because I’m nervous about accidentally snapping it. That being said, I never use it on my lap unless I have a book beneath it. However! it works wonderfully for the price! Best purchase I’ve made in a while.
customer_reviews.author: AnonPeaks

customer_reviews.title: Overall great keyboard, just one major glitch
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm very happy with this keyboard. The only major complaint is that the ?/ button is below the shift button on the right instead of next to it. The page up button is there instead. I've accidentally hit that several times, often causing me to type over what I've already written or deleting it. Luckily I don't write a ton of questions, but it still makes me curse when it happens.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Brackett

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for a while.
customer_reviews.text: The product felt solidly built. Easy to connect. After a while of regular use a group of keys would not work. Then they would, then not again. Even after fully charged. Very disapointed. I enjoyed using it for a time.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Rouse

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my Note 9
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is just what I needed. It is small, light, great battery life and connects without hassle to my Note 9. In addition it comes with a case that also acts as a stand. The stand is quite adjustable for just about any product. The keyboard only takes a few minutes to adjust to. I am now sending full length emails from my Note 9. Goodbye laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: This keyboard is very useful for my occasional use with my tablet
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is very useful for my occasional use with my tablet. Very nice, lighter and smaller than I expected so easy to carry it around. The plastic tablet/phone holder is very useful and of course acts as the keyboard storage holder. highly recommend especially at such a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful Keyboard that is protected and travels well. The space in the middle is not as noticeable as I thought it would be. If you don't have a case the stand works really well, though not as well with the cases on the iPad
customer_reviews.author: Ceidra

customer_reviews.title: It is small and portable, but not very sensitive
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty compact in size, but not very light in weight. My big problem is the keys are not very sensitive to touch, I could not get a smooth typing.
customer_reviews.author: VD Studio

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: It works. Took a while to recognize my iPad 10.5. There's a slight delay between hitting keys and letters appearing. It still hasn't been recognized by my Windows 10 laptop or desktop, but as I bought it mainly for the iPad, that's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Edit: I was contacted by the seller and they refunded me for my order. I am very grateful they reached out and fixed the problem. This keyboard would be very practical, but you can't type freely. There's a lot of random characters that show up when you're typing, and it's impossible to write a single sentence without the configuration changing randomly to another language. It's much faster to type on the screen itself than to use this keyboard. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good with one small issue
customer_reviews.text: I like this little keyboard for the most part but the odd placement of some of the keys, particularly the question mark makes it more difficult to use than it could be.
customer_reviews.author: Nomore privacy

customer_reviews.title: Great to make Instagram posts from phone!
customer_reviews.text: I've been doing more Instagram posts lately & wanted something to help so I didn't have to use the keyboard on the phone. This does the trick!! It's a little on the small size which is good for portability but does take a bit to get used to typing on it. Now that I've done it a few times, no problem!! I really like that I can throw it in my bag and catch up on emails, posts, etc. from anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Ceejoy

customer_reviews.title: ? mark placement is funky
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product overall, but I am continuously annoyed with the placement of the ? mark. When typing and needing to add a ? mark, I constantly keep inadvertently deleting a whole line of text. Because to keep it spall they've inserted the arrow buttons where the ? mark should be by the shift key and then it ends up highlighting the text and deleting it. it is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I really love this wireless keyboard because it is easy to connect, use, and it is portable. I mostly use this keyboard to take notes on my tablet for my college classes, so i wont have to carry my heavy laptop around all day. It definitely does everything that is advertised ! Good Quality, Great Product
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I am actually shocked at how well this product works. It’s easy to use and it’s perfect for me. Since I’m a full time student and I’m always doing homework on the go, this makes it sooo much easier to do definitely on my phone. Doesn’t feel cheap, have to kind of get use to the button locations but other than that its a great product. IM ACTUALLY USING IT TO TYPE THIS REVIEW at puzzle fun dome on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: timesha

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice — except for typing!
customer_reviews.text: It’s fine — except for typing! I’m a touch typist and I don’t want to have to look at the keyboard. Some of the keys on the one are just too out of place. Getting to the “B” key with my left forefinger was a HUGE reach. Most of the time I only made it to the big gap in the middle, or hit wrong keys. Typing the “N” key always ended up as “B”. It seems like a nice little keyboard otherwise. I decided to keep it to use with my Apple TV for inputting commands or text — one letter at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Not great for touch typists
customer_reviews.text: It connects really easily and looks cool but it for some reason has the questionmark in an odd place which makes it hard for touch typists because you have to stop and find it. They have "page up" where the question mark should be. Aside from that maybe a compatibility issue with my tablet but it freezes or outputs a bunch of the same letter sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: JSFK

customer_reviews.title: I’m impressed.
customer_reviews.text: My first keyboard had a bad backspace button - never fret, simple email and BOOM! Immediate response from the company who first offered diagnostic help and then shipped me a new one with a 99% off coupon. I can’t complain; customer service was supreme and they were snappy with their responses. Plus, I use this A LOT with my iPad for college and it WORKS. Even my hands can fit well, and I haven’t charged it in weeks and it’s still good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Pfefferle

customer_reviews.title: Easy start-check connector
customer_reviews.text: Great little keyboard. I connected it to Bluetooth and it was up and running. The only hiccup is the charging connection. It is the old iPhone 5/6 connection type so make sure you have a converter which luckily I had. I would recommend to anyone trying to type long messages via their phone. I’m using it for my journal.
customer_reviews.author: FiFiD

customer_reviews.title: Very portable
customer_reviews.text: The case and stand in one is an excellent idea. The keyboard folding in hand makes it very portable and easy to stash in a ladies bag. The only issue I have with it is the partition/divider that splits the keyboard in half is flimsy and not as sturdy as I would like. Other than that I would have given it a five star.
customer_reviews.author: CDC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing portable slim keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to any tablet or phone user, this is so great, sont hesitate and buy it, wont find anything better for this price
customer_reviews.author: Maurizio

customer_reviews.title: Bought it in May. It’s unusable two months later.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Then the b key stopped working, then the n. Then the left arrow key and the backspace stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is easy to use and portable. I use it almost exclusively with my iPhone—my figures can type so much faster on the foldable keyboard. I had an older Brookstone keyboard. This one is even better and more substantial. It’s finger action is very good, and holds a charge a long time. I’m very content and happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Margop

customer_reviews.title: Good quality keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I have had other portable keyboards. This one has more stability as you type on it. Also the keys are more responsive. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Shumanfoo

customer_reviews.title: travel convenient
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my tablet. Have not had an issue with it. I like that it has it's own case and is hard shelled so it is protected
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set up and It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality ofbtthe keyboard and ease of use. You click one button to connect the first time and that is it. I remember when the palm pilot came out with a keyboard, what a help. This keyboard is even better. A must have!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Compact
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Compact, easy to use. The only thing to be aware of is that it feels like it could easily break if turned in the opposite direction of folding. It also takes some getting used to for the shift and ? buttons. They're a bit out of place/smaller.
customer_reviews.author: nexusBOS

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Folds small enough to fit into my purse. This device makes it easier to get some work done when I'm out! The only drawback is that I can't just use this on my lap...it will fold in on itself if it's not on a flat surface. Also, the B key is in an odd place due to where the keyboard folds, but otherwise, love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Spangler

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and set up.
customer_reviews.text: I love it now I don’t have to lug my iPad around everywhere . I can now type on a keyboard I really hate trying to type on the little phone . Very portable been so far has seem to hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C

customer_reviews.title: I love this keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: This is great to use with my LG v20 smartphone. It connects easily and works great and I love that it's split in the middle so it mimics the ergonomical keyboard. The only downside is that the buttons are not all in the same place as a normal keyboard so takes some getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: Quality and functionality are great and for the price, good money spent. I am thinking of purchasing another one for a family member. The customer service email didn’t work, so I couldn’t take advantage of the 20% off next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karen C.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: this a little gem. And you can't beat the price with a bag of hammers! Great design and I can use it almost anywhere. I bought it for my desk at work. My bosses text as a preference and keeping up with them on the fly can be a challenge. I'm quicker with my new little keyboard than I am with my thumbs, so this was the perfect get. Get one. You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a convenient solution for taking notes at meetings. I really didn't want another devise to tote around. This fits easily in a bag and the key board feels great when typing. The price is so low!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like it! I need to adjust my typing habits a little since there is some space between the two halves but overall it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Siqi Wang

customer_reviews.title: Light and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this item. Very slick. Easy to sync. I’m planning to keep it at work while I carry my iPad back and forth. The stand is a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Baroness

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and hook up to devices
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for when I travel and need to blog on my ipad. it makes it easier to work on projects without dragging my macbook out with me. Its very light and easy to use and I adjusted quickly to the style of the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Belladonna Doll

customer_reviews.title: Nor worrh my money
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay, if you want to use it on anything but a hard surface DO NOT BUY IT. it doesn’t work well at all if not being used on a surface (table, Ect) the battery life sucks.
customer_reviews.author: LORENA DE MELLO

customer_reviews.title: Compact nice design
customer_reviews.text: As of right now this keyboard is great! I’ve used it for a week so far with my iPad Mini 4 and it’s ideal if you don’t want a case with a built in keyboard. The keys have a great response and feel really nice. The overall design is great and it really compact.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy
customer_reviews.text: Cant get a better feal that an portable keyboard that is easy to transport and utilize in a pinch!
customer_reviews.author: Julia A. Camerlingo

customer_reviews.title: So incredibly excellent. Only down side it it's not clear when ...
customer_reviews.text: So incredibly excellent. Only down side it it's not clear when the battery isn't charged.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne D. Light

customer_reviews.title: Works great until writing fails.
customer_reviews.text: Cute, easily folds. But after just over a year of limited use, some of the keys are not working (n, m, etc.). I’ve noticed that it might be a wiring issue since if I set it at an angle instead of flat, those keys might work. Folding is great for compact features, but not if it ruins ability to type. Was great when it did work!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: I didn't even get the chance to clumsily break it myself
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this keyboard at first because it's compact, travels well, has a very sturdy case, long battery life, and the keys are smooth and quiet. I didn't mind the key placement, but the bendy bit in the middle went upwards which made it more difficult to type comfortably. Unfortunately after a couple months of light use I didn't even get the chance to clumsily break it myself. Almost all of the keys on the right side stopped working one by one, and the bluetooth started taking several tries to connect.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie P.

customer_reviews.title: a total lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: So much easier to get things done on my phone when I was between laptops or just don't feel like lugging my new one around with me. Works perfectly every time and the size is comfortable for typing on. Fits in my purse easily. Has a lovely case that doubles as a phone stand.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica  A

customer_reviews.title: Nice keyboard
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a great find it charged quick and connected easily for a small board it is really useable. A guy with big beefy hands might not find it as easy but the keys are well spaced and accurate. I’m glad I got this one
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It does what is advertised and I really like being able to take it in my purse and use it with my iphone.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Right Size! Responsive Keys!
customer_reviews.text: This product is the "bomb"! Nice size for a portable keyboard, responsive keys and conveniently folds up. Had to access my bluetooth settings on Windows 10 for unit to successfully pair however once paired, nothing but fun.
customer_reviews.author: Dowaly

customer_reviews.title: Great for use with iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Great for use with iPhone, the case doesn't hold up the iPad very well as the case is very light. The keyboard is nice but it has taken me some time to adapt to the space in the middle. Works with anything with Bluetooth. Great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie N

customer_reviews.title: OMG!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect travel keyboard with my Android phone. Easy bluetooth link. Folds into its own case and is only a little bigger than my phone. Nifty.
customer_reviews.author: Linzleh

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It's probably OK for occasional use. Key spacing doesn't fee natural due to the fold in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Gary W. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Got it in July and by September some of the buttons weren't working anymore. So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: libby

customer_reviews.title: Loved the keyboard so far
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard turned on and connected to my iPhone 7 first time out of the box. Typing was relatively easy with some small personal adjustments to my keyboard habits. Definitely like it.
customer_reviews.author: uttzey

customer_reviews.title: Nicely designed, well made, multiple platforms.
customer_reviews.text: Great tactile response similar to my Apple keyboard. Works on every device I tried it on including my Raspberry Pi development board. So - yes- flavors of Linux too!. Comes with a nifty case that has built in holders for your phone or tablet! A well designed product - and I'm an Industrial Designer! ;)
customer_reviews.author: R. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!! I love this keyboard
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT!! I love this keyboard, using it to type from my iphone 6s. Pairs perfectly, holds charge and above everything has tremendously helped woth my carpel tunnel and tendinitis. Will get many more as gifta for family😊
customer_reviews.author: @Biryani.Soul

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished arrived broken - would not recommend buying
customer_reviews.text: Ordered refurbished product. 'P' key was detached upon opening packaging. Was able to fix but periodically detaches still. Another key started doing the same thing. Don't have time to waste returning poorly made products.
customer_reviews.author: Dave C.

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Easy to use Foldable Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product that is both easy to use and pair with your device. I use mine with an iPhone and actually complete college coursework on it. I like the feel of the keys, which seem just like a regular keyboard and though the arrangement is a bit smaller, I had no problem working with it. The only thing I wasn’t expecting was the lack of its own charge cord.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short Good run
customer_reviews.text: It’s so cute, innovative, and compact but it’s keys no longer work after like two months of almost daily use. I was disappointed but it had a good run while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Just works
customer_reviews.text: I am using this keyboard with my Windows 10 tablet - works fine. Like the case that comes with the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Z

customer_reviews.title: The size is good and it works great on iOS
customer_reviews.text: Very excited about this keyboard. It's just what I needed. The size is good and it works great on iOS. I have only had it for a week, so durability has yet to be determined. Even though its made of plastic and its small, I think that if its maintained it should be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: schafe20

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with it even though I have only used it a few times so far. I was worried that the volume and play controls wouldn't work with my ipad but they do! So I'm a happy camper so far. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little accessory for the phone
customer_reviews.text: Great little keyboard to carry around with you. Battery life not the greatest though.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mutkoski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portable keyboard for iPad
customer_reviews.text: Perfect portable keyboard for iPad. Easy to use and lightweight. Durable case, great battery
customer_reviews.author: pip pip

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and easy to store.
customer_reviews.text: Using the keyboard with my new IPAD. Perfect size, fits in my bag and it stays “put” while I’m using it, no sliding around. Great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Shaz

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this item
customer_reviews.text: I had this keyboard for a few weeks, went to go use it last week, and the keyboard melted into the case. So, I never even got to use it. Do not purchase this item
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Lynn Purdy

customer_reviews.title: I love this, has nice case that becomes an iPad ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this, has nice case that becomes an iPad holder, the keyboard is well made and big enough to type on.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: I really like this keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I really like this keyboard. Sometimes you have to punch the keys harder to make them work but I like it for my iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Sargent

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Simple
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Simple, easy to use, great for working without a computer and you're tired of typing with your thumbs.
customer_reviews.author: Cerrasponda

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: Seems perfect! We are still evaluating the keyboard. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Odd layout due to folding ability; holds charge and works well otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Robinson

customer_reviews.title: The best keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I love love this keyboard. Very light weight. Easy to carry, small and style so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Rattana Downing

product_meta.title: Foldable Bluetooth Keyboard, IKOS Ultra Slim Mini BT Folding Keyboard Compatible for iPhone X 8 7 6S 6 Plus, iPad Mini/Pro/Air, Samsung and All Other Android Smartphones/Tablets and Windows System
feature_bullets: IOS / Windows / Android Compatibility: Compatible with 3 major operating system: iOS / Windows/ Android. Supports most bluetooth-enabled devices, including Apple iPhone 7 / 7 Plus / 6s / 6s Plus Pocket Size / Lightweight: When folded, the keyboard is smaller than an iPhone 6 Plus, perfect for travel or business trip etc.

PORTABLE & LIGHTWEIGHT : This Folding Bluetooth Keyboard onvenient and lightweight (0.49lbs) pocket sized (Folding size: 4.33"*5.12"*0.47", Open size:11.54"*3.32"*0.26".), folding bluetooth keyboard, perfect for travel. PC Recommend Editors' Choice, It also can be a perfect gift choice for anyone who often travel or business trip.

IT'S SMOOTH, VERY SMOOTH - The gratifying tactile feel of the keys will titillate your senses and inspire you to do your very best work. The scissor-switch technology makes sure that even the softest keystroke is enough, relieving any unneeded stress while typing. We've included a smart case, which also serves as a stand that holds various tablets or smartphones on your desk or picnic towel.

80 HOURS ON A SINGLE CHARGE - Thanks to our unique PlayXTend battery, a 2-hour charge lets you forget about recharging for over a month! Get your work done quickly and efficiently without finding yourself stuck with a dead battery. Ultra slim and lightweight device that's truly mobile with a battery which keeps going and going.
RELIABLE and FRIENDLY CUSTOMER SERVICE: We offer 1 Year Manufacturer's Warranty and Friendly Customer Service for JOYKEY foldable bluetooth keyboard, ready to respond your message within 24 hours.
